properties.name: scheduler.instruction.manager-timeout
properties.description:
The amount of time that the cluster manager should wait for all published
 instructions to complete before giving up (in milliseconds).

properties.name: scheduler.instruction.poll-interval
properties.description:
The amount of time that the instruction worker should wait before checking whether
 the instruction logic has completed (in milliseconds).

properties.name: scheduler.instruction.poll-timeout
properties.description:
The amount of time that the instruction worker should wait for the instruction
 logic to complete before giving up (in milliseconds).

properties.name: scheduler.rebalance-interval
properties.description: The amount of time that should pass between cluster re-balancing, in milliseconds.

properties.name: scheduler.rebalance-poll-delay
properties.description:
The amount of time that the application should wait until it starts checking whether
 a re-balance should occur, in milliseconds.

properties.name: scheduler.rebalance-poll-interval
properties.description:
The amount of time that should pass between checks to determine whether a re-rebalance
 should occur, in milliseconds.
